attributes.action: remove all American military personnel from the UK and withdraw all joint military co-operation between Anglo-American Military Forces until the United States Government and Military co-operates fully with requests for evidence and/or information from the British legal system in friendly fire incidents.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The American Military at present will not co-operate with any of its allies legal systems, or any investigations and requests for information in which American service personnel are involved in incidents which injure or kill allied service personnel. Evidence is deliberately withheld. 
Therefor, until they do co-operate, all US service personnel should be removed from British soil.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
